title: Un Ballo in maschera
brief_description: Elijah Moshinsky’s production of Giuseppe Verdi’s opera in three acts, recorded live for television at the Metropolitan Opera on 16 February 1980. This modern version of “Un Ballo in Maschera” is set in 18th century Boston on the eve of the American Revolution and stars Luciano Pavarotti in the role of Ricardo supported by a cast of performers including Katia Ricciarelli, Judith Blegen, Bianca Berini and Louis Quilico. Features the Metropolitan Opera Chorus and Orchestra conducted by Giuseppe Patane. Sung in Italian with English subtitles.
